Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS
REFERRED TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS

Title: Makes certain benefits available to members of the Dutchess county sheriff's department
Summary: Makes certain benefits available to members of the Dutchess county sheriff's department upon the election to offer such benefits by Dutchess county.
LawCode: Amd ยง89-p, add ยง561, R & SS L
